_sText:
Map Name: hellscrypt

Author Michael Russell a.k.a. Hellbinder
hellbinder@comcast.net

Game Type: Zombie, I wouldnt use this map for any other game type.

The zip file contains the following files:

hellscrypt.bsp
hellscrypt.nav
hellscrypt.res

The zip file also contains the two folders:

decals
sound

To install place hellscrypt.bsp and hellscrypt.nav into your map folder..example:

C:\Program Files\Steam\SteamApps\youraccountname\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps

*This example is from a Vista machine the folder might be differently placed on an XP machine*


Place the decals folder into the following directory:

C:\Program Files\Steam\SteamApps\youraccountname\counter-strike source\cstrike\materials


Place the sound folder into the following directory:

C:\Program Files\Steam\SteamApps\youraccountname\counter-strike source\cstrike

If you did everything ok the map should be ready to play. The file: hellscrypt.res is for
running the map on a server. If you want to use the map on your server put this file into your map directory
along with the other files as instructed above.

Thanks
